comments:
3.1RC2 June 10th 0010 build

- use the Plug-in Project creation wizard to create a Hello World project
- in the Package Explorer expand the new project's Plug-in Dependencies item and
select its first child (org.eclipse.ui_3.1.0.jar - ...)
- right-click -> Properties
- click OK in the properties dialog and you'll get the following exception:

Problem is that the dialog doesn't support any editing of the fields, however
the OK button is enabled.

Created an attachment (id=23217)
patch

apply patch on JavadocConfigurationPropertyPage.java
suggest to fix for RC3. Fix is trivial. Dirk?

Reviewed patch and tested that it fixes the problem. 

+1 for RC3.

Daniel can you please cast your vote.
Verified on I20050617-0010 that pressing the OK button doesn't cause any exception.
